Some statistics on products and their ingredients in the Swiss Register of Plant Protection Products

Johannes Ranke

Last change 19 June 2024 (rebuilt 2024-06-19)

Source: vignettes/some_statistics.Rmd
some_statistics.Rmd
knitr::opts_chunk$set(tidy = FALSE, cache = FALSE)
options(knitr.kable.NA = '')
library(srppp)
library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
library(knitr)
srppp <- srppp_dm(srppp_xml_url)
n_wNbrs <- nrow(srppp$products)
n_pNbrs <- length(unique(srppp$products$pNbr))

At the build time of this vignette, there are 1694 product registrations for 1110 different product types in the Swiss Register of Plant Protection Products (SRPPP) as published on the website of the Federal Food Safety and Veterinary Office.

The table below shows how many different ingredients of different ingredient types are registered.

srppp$ingredients |> 
  select(pk, type) |> 
  unique() |> 
  group_by(type) |> 
  summarize(n = n())
## # A tibble: 4 Ã— 2
##   type                    n
##   <chr>               <int>
## 1 ACTIVE_INGREDIENT     335
## 2 ADDITIVE_TO_DECLARE   101
## 3 SAFENER                 5
## 4 SYNERGIST               2

The number of product types (different P-Numbers) containing a specific safener or a synergist are listed below.

srppp$ingredients |> 
  select(pNbr, pk, type) |> 
  filter(type %in% c("SYNERGIST", "SAFENER")) |> 
  left_join(srppp$substances, join_by(pk)) |> 
  select(substance_de, type, pNbr) |> 
  group_by(type, substance_de) |> 
  summarize(n = n(), .groups = "drop_last") |> 
  select(type, substance_de, n) |> 
  arrange(type, substance_de)
## # A tibble: 7 Ã— 3
## # Groups:   type [2]
##   type      substance_de           n
##   <chr>     <chr>              <int>
## 1 SAFENER   Benoxacor              1
## 2 SAFENER   Cloquintocet-mexyl    17
## 3 SAFENER   Cyprosulfamid          2
## 4 SAFENER   Isoxadifen-ethyl       3
## 5 SAFENER   Mefenpyr-Diethyl      10
## 6 SYNERGIST Piperonyl butoxid      6
## 7 SYNERGIST SesamÃ¶l raffiniert     3
